title: Retail Cashier
description: Seeking a friendly and efficient cashier to handle customer transactions. Previous retail experience is a plus.

title: Remote Customer Service Representative
description: Join our world-class support team to help users navigate our payment platform. Excellent communication skills required.

title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: Work with our engineering team to build and maintain user-facing features. Basic knowledge of React is needed.

title: Graduate Trainee Engineer
description: We are recruiting young graduates into our engineering trainee program. Strong academic background required.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design intuitive and visually appealing user experiences for our fintech products. Experience with Figma preferred.

title: Warehouse Supervisor
description: Supervise warehouse staff, manage inventory, and ensure timely delivery of products to customers.

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our engineering team to build scalable backend services. Proficiency in Node.js and PostgreSQL required.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data, create reports, and support decision-making with actionable insights.

title: Sales Associate
description: Engage customers, drive sales, and provide after-sales support in our retail electronics store.

title: Administrative Assistant
description: Provide clerical and administrative support to the department. Strong organizational skills required.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Learn and contribute to real-world software projects in a remote-first engineering team.

title: Marketing Executive
description: Promote bank products and services to potential clients. Experience in sales or marketing is a plus.

title: Content Writer
description: Research and write high-quality articles on tech and startups in Africa. Strong writing skills required.

title: HR Assistant
description: Assist the HR department with recruitment, employee onboarding, and payroll processing.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Create designs for movie posters, digital campaigns, and promotional content.

title: IT Support Officer
description: Provide technical support for IT systems and resolve customer IT-related issues.

title: Delivery Rider
description: Deliver food orders to customers promptly. Must own a smartphone and valid rider's license.

title: Legal Intern
description: Assist with legal research, drafting documents, and providing support to the firm's partners.

title: Finance Analyst
description: Support clients with financial modeling, data analysis, and reporting.

title: Customer Care Officer
description: Resolve customer complaints, provide information, and ensure satisfaction with services.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build and optimize web pages for hotel booking platforms. Knowledge of React is essential.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Assist lecturers with teaching, marking, and tutoring undergraduate students.

title: Data Entry Clerk
description: Input and verify production and sales data. Attention to detail is crucial.

title: Field Sales Agent
description: Drive SIM registrations, promote MTN products, and onboard new customers.

title: Product Manager
description: Own the product lifecycle from ideation to delivery. Prior fintech experience is an advantage.

title: Call Center Agent
description: Answer inbound calls and assist customers with service-related inquiries.

title: Research Assistant
description: Assist with medical research projects, data collection, and report writing.

title: Operations Manager
description: Oversee logistics operations, supervise staff, and ensure customer satisfaction.

title: Business Development Officer
description: Develop client relationships, identify opportunities, and drive revenue growth.

title: Social Media Manager
description: Manage social media pages, engage the audience, and drive online growth with creative content.
